pageContent: Objective: To test high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) as salvage first-line treatment for palpable, TRUS-evidenced, biopsy-proven locally recurrent prostate cancer (CaP) after radical prostatectomy (RP).

metaData.source:
MRI appearance of prostate following transrectal HIFU ablation of localized cancer
